# Multiple Tables

## Simple Table

| Name | Age | City |
|------|-----|------|
| Alice | 30 | Tokyo |
| Bob | 25 | Osaka |

## Long Text Table

| Category | Description | Notes |
|----------|-------------|-------|
| Architecture | This is a very long description that should wrap across multiple lines in the PDF to test the auto-wrapping behavior of the table rendering engine. | Important note about architecture decisions that were made during the design phase. |
| Implementation | Another lengthy description covering the implementation details including technology stack choices, deployment strategies, and testing methodologies. | Notes about implementation timeline and resource allocation. |
| Testing | QA strategy including unit tests, integration tests, end-to-end tests, and performance benchmarks that need to be completed before the release. | Testing notes and coverage requirements. |

## Many Columns

| A | B | C | D | E | F |
|---|---|---|---|---|---|
| 1 | 2 | 3 | 4 | 5 | 6 |
| a | b | c | d | e | f |
| x | y | z | w | v | u |
